title: Use Alphabet Positions
text: Convert each letter to its position in the alphabet (A=1, B=2, ..., Z=26).

title: Find the Differences
text: Look at the difference between each position: B=2, D=4, G=7, K=11, P=16. The differences are +2, +3, +4, +5.

title: Predict the Next Step
text: If the pattern continues (+2, +3, +4, +5), the next difference should be +6. 16 (P) + 6 = 22 â†’ The 22nd letter is V.
